outputs.output_descr:
Support to Office of the Attorney General to Strengthen its capacity to draft and review national laws pertaining to Convention Rright to Children and Convention on the Elimination of All Forms of Discrimination Against Women.
- National capacity strengthened to draft, review and implement national policies and legislations.

project_descr: Enhance Institutional and Human Capacity of Office of the Attorney General.
project_title: Enhance institutional & human capacity of OAG to combat
